thread.title: 2015 New York Comic Con pictures

author: courant.com
title: 2015 New York Comic Con pictures
text:
Caption 2015 New York Comic Con TIMOTHY A. CLARY / AFP/Getty Images Fans of comics, sci-fi and other pop culture phenomena gathered in New York for the four-day New York Comic Con from Oct. 8-11, 2015.
Fans of comics, sci-fi and other pop culture phenomena gathered in New York for the four-day New York Comic Con from Oct. 8-11, 2015.
(TIMOTHY A. CLARY / AFP/Getty Images) 2015 New York Comic Con TIMOTHY A. CLARY / AFP/Getty Images Fans of comics, sci-fi and other pop culture phenomena gathered in New York for the four-day New York Comic Con from Oct. 8-11, 2015.
Fans of comics, sci-fi and other pop culture phenomena gathered in New York for the four-day New York Comic Con from Oct. 8-11, 2015.
(TIMOTHY A. CLARY / AFP/Getty Images) See more galleries Celebrities and fans of comics, sci-fi and other pop culture phenomena gathered in New York for the annual New York Comic Con at Jacob Javitz Center from Oct. 8-11, 2015. The four-day event is the largest of its kind on the East Coast.
